mapper.insert: insert into `comment` (content, created_at, article_id, user_id) value (#{content}, now(), #{articleId}, #{userId})
mapper.update: update comment set content=#{content} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select c.id, c.content, c.created_at, u.nickname as userNickname, u.image_key as userImageKey from comment c, user u where c.user_id = u.id and c.article_id = #{id} order by c.created_at desc
